mapper.sql: n_id, n_name, n_author, n_url, n_type, n_desc, n_add_time, site_id, n_status, n_last_chapter, n_last_chapter_url, "n_browse"
mapper.select: select n_id, n_name, n_author, n_url, n_type,n_add_time, site_id, n_status,n_last_chapter,n_browse, n_last_chapter_url from v_novel where n_type = #{type} order by n_browse

mapper.update:
update t_novel
n_name = #{nName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
n_author = #{nAuthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
n_url = #{nUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

n_last_chapter_url = #{nLastChapterUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
"n_browse" = #{nBrowse,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where n_id = #{nId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_novel set n_name = #{nName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, n_author = #{nAuthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, n_url = #{nUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, n_type = #{nType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, n_desc = #{nDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, n_add_time = #{nAddTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, site_id = #{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, n_status = #{nStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, n_last_chapter = #{nLastChapter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, n_last_chapter_url = #{nLastChapterUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "n_browse" = #{nBrowse,jdbcType=INTEGER} where n_id = #{nId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
